title: Implement mobile responsive layout with tabs
description:
Add mobile-specific layout to tick-board for screens ≤480px:

Mobile layout using Shoelace sl-tab-group:
- Replace 5-column grid with tab-based column switching
- sl-tab for each column (Blocked, Ready, In Progress, Review, Done)
- sl-tab-panel containing tick-cards for selected column
- Tab badge showing tick count

Mobile header:
- Hamburger menu for filters (sl-drawer from left)
- Compact search
- Create button remains visible

Mobile detail drawer:
- Full-width (100vw)
- Larger touch targets for buttons

Breakpoints:
- ≤480px: Tab layout
- 481-768px: Horizontal scroll with snap
- >768px: 5-column grid

Test: Resize to mobile, verify tab switching, touch interactions
acceptance_criteria: Mobile layout shows tabs, switching works, drawer is full-width, touch targets ≥44px
